name: a coin to Aruanda
description: Aruandê is the title of a theatrical show that took place in Belém do Pará in late 2019, a few months before the start of the pandemic. Aruanda is a place of peace according to Umbanda, an African-born religion born in Brazil. The economic and social processes that the world has been facing have frequently reified our spaces of pleasure, not charging more and more for our own lives.  To learn more about Arauandê visit: http://behance.com/tarcisiogabriel
